sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均有"金钱"之意。
means: money ： 钱的通称，可以是硬币可以是纸币，也可指用作货币的其它物品。
cash ： 特指立即可以兑现的现金或现款。
currency ： 指在流通中的货币，是全部流通中通货的总称，也可指纸币。

example.en: He made money hand over fist by acting.

list.explanation: 暗款，匿报的非法收益(也指偷税漏税的收入)，不义之财

example.en: Money that derives from an illegal transaction is considered" dirty" or" black " cash.
example.zh: 从非法交易来的钱被视为"赃钱"或者"不义之财"。

list.explanation: (黑社会用语)留作日后打关司或坐牢用的专款

example.en: Robeson set aside a percentage of his taking for fall money.
example.zh: 罗伯逊从他的荷包中留出一部分作为日后吃官司用的钱。

Sentence.come: 2019年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: For the time, attention, and money of the art-loving public, classical instrumentalists must compete not only with opera houses, dance troupes, theater companies, and museums, but also with the recorded performances of the great classical musicians of the
Sentence.come: 2011年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: given the advantages of electronic money, you might think that we would move quickly to the cashless society in which all payments are made electronically.
Sentence.come: 2013年考研真题（英语二）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: He's feeling positive, but he'll carry on blogging-not about eating as cheaply as you can—"there are so many people in a much worse state, with barely any money to spend on food"—but eating well on a budget.
Sentence.come: 2013年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: If she hopes her new-found fortune will yield lasting feelings of fulfillment, she could do worse than read Happy Money by Elizabeth Dunn and Michael Norton.
Sentence.come: 2014年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: If there is a role for government, it should really be getting involved in providing common goods—making sure there is space for playing fields and the money to pave tennis and netball courts, and encouraging the provision of all these activities in schoo
Sentence.come: 2017年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: In a Swiss study, researchers sprayed oxytocin into the noses of half the subjects; those subjects were ready to lend significantly higher amounts of money to strangers than were their counterparts who inhaled something else.
Sentence.come: 2018年考研真题（英语一）完形填空 Section Ⅰ

Sentence.sentence: It is far better to spend money on experiences, say Ms Dunn and Mr Norton, like interesting trips, unique meals or even going to the cinema.
Sentence.come: 2014年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Money may not quite buy happiness, but people in wealthier countries are generally happier than those in poor ones.
Sentence.come: 2014年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Readers of Happy Money are clearly a privileged lot, anxious about fulfillment, not hunger.
Sentence.come: 2014年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Scientific publishing has long been a licence to print money.
Sentence.come: 2020年考研真题（英语一）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Taking a gap year to figure things out initially can help prevent stress and save money later on.
Sentence.come: 2017年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: These two academics use an array of behavioral research to show that the most rewarding ways to spend money can be counter-intuitive.
Sentence.come: 2014年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: They are energetic participants in a global economy driven by the flow of work, money and ideas.
Sentence.come: 2013年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

Sentence.sentence: Yet the link between feeling good and spending money on others can be seen among rich and poor people around the world, and scarcity enhances the pleasure of most things for most people.
Sentence.come: 2014年考研真题（英语二）阅读理解 Section Ⅱ

sentences.en: His father makes a lot of money as a pilot.
sentences.cn: 他父亲当飞机驾驶员挣钱很多。

sentences.en: The teacher told us something about the money of Europe in the Middle Ages.
sentences.cn: 老师给我们讲了一些有关中世纪欧洲货币的情况。

sentences.en: The boss has put all his money into that speculative enterprise.
sentences.cn: 这个老板把他的全部财产都投到那个投机事业中。

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)have or win a lot of money
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)很富裕；赢了一大笔钱

lj.lj_ly: for my money, they're one of the best bands around.
lj.lj_ls: 据我看来，他们是此地最好乐队之一。

phrase.cizu_name: money for old rope (或 money for jam)

jx.jx_en_mean: (Brit. informal)money or reward earned for little or no effort
jx.jx_cn_mean: (英，非正式)容易赚的钱；不费吹灰之力的收益

phrase.cizu_name: (the love of) money is the root of all evil

jx.jx_en_mean: (proverb)avarice gives rise to selfish or wicked actions
(proverb)wealth gives power and influence to those who possess it

phrase.cizu_name: put money (或 put one's money) on

jx.jx_en_mean: used to express one's confidence in the truth or success of something
jx.jx_cn_mean: 确信…的真实性；确信…会成功

lj.lj_ly: she won't have him back—I'd put money on it.
lj.lj_ls: 她不会让他回来了——我敢打赌。

phrase.cizu_name: put one's money where one's mouth is

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)take action to support one's statements or opinions

phrase.cizu_name: see the colour of someone's money

jx.jx_en_mean: receive some proof that someone has enough money to pay for something
jx.jx_cn_mean: 得到某人付得起的证据

jx.jx_en_mean: spend one's money extravagantly or carelessly
try to solve a problem by recklessly spending money on it, without due consideration of what is required
According to one's opinion, choice, or preference
jx.jx_cn_mean: 依照某人的意见、选择或偏好

lj.lj_ly: For my money, it's not worth the trouble.
lj.lj_ls: 在我看来，不值得这样费力

jx.jx_en_mean: &I{Sports} &I{Games} Taking first, second, or third place in a contest on which a bet has been placed, such as a horserace.
jx.jx_cn_mean: &I{【体育运动】} &I{【游戏】} 在已下赌注的比赛中，如赛马，处于第一、第二或第三位的

entry.def: Money is the coins or bank notes that you use to buy things, or the sum that you have in a bank account.

example.ex: A lot of the money that you pay at the cinema goes back to the film distributors...
example.tran: 你在电影院消费的一大部分钱都会回到电影发行商手里。

example.ex: Players should be allowed to earn money from advertising...
example.tran: 应该允许运动员拍广告挣钱。

entry.def: Monies is used to refer to several separate sums of money that form part of a larger amount that is received or spent.

example.ex: We drew up a schedule of payments for the rest of the monies owed.
example.tran: 我们起草了一份剩余欠款的还款计划。

example.ex: ...the investment and management of monies by pension funds.
example.tran: 养老基金对资金的投资与管理

entry.def: If you say that someone has money to burn, you mean that they have more money than they need or that they spend their money on things that you think are unnecessary.
entry.tran: 有花不完的钱;钱多得烫手;钱多得烧包

example.ex: He was a high-earning broker with money to burn.
example.tran: 他是高收入的经纪人，有花不完的钱。

entry.def: If you are in the money, you have a lot of money to spend.
entry.tran: 非常有钱的;手头宽裕的

example.ex: If you are one of the lucky callers chosen to play, you could be in the money.
example.tran: 如果你有幸成为其中一个被选中参加表演的来电者，就可能会赚大钱。

entry.def: If you make money, you obtain money by earning it or by making a profit.

example.ex: They couldn't find work or make money in the cities.
example.tran: 他们在城市找不到工作，也赚不到钱。

example.ex: ...the only bit of the firm that consistently made money.
example.tran: 公司唯一一直赚钱的一小块业务

entry.def: If you say that you want someone to put their money where their mouth is, you want them to spend money to improve a bad situation, instead of just talking about improving it.
entry.tran: 用行动证明自己的话；说到做到;说给钱就给钱

example.ex: The government might be obliged to put its money where its mouth is to prove its commitment.
example.tran: 政府也许会被迫付出行动，以兑现承诺。

entry.def: If you say that the smart money is on a particular person or thing, you mean that people who know a lot about it think that this person will be successful, or this thing will happen.
entry.tran: (因掌握内情而下的)高明赌注

example.ex: With England not playing, the smart money was on the Germans...
example.tran: 英格兰队没有参赛，所以人们看好德国队应该会赢。

entry.def: If you say that money talks, you mean that if someone has a lot of money, they also have a lot of power.
entry.tran: 金钱万能;有钱能使鬼推磨

example.ex: The formula in Hollywood is simple—money talks.
example.tran: 好莱坞的生存规则很简单，就是金钱万能。

entry.def: If you say that someone is throwing money at a problem, you are critical of them for trying to improve it by spending money on it, instead of doing more thoughtful and practical things to improve it.

example.ex: The Australian government's answer to the problem has been to throw money at it.
example.tran: 澳大利亚政府对这个问题的解决方案一直就是大把往里扔钱。

entry.def: If you say that someone is throwing good money after bad, you are critical of them for trying to improve a bad situation by spending more money on it, instead of doing more thoughtful or practical things to improve it.
entry.tran: 花钱填无底洞;继续砸钱

example.ex: Further heavy intervention would be throwing good money after bad.
example.tran: 进一步加大干预的力度只会是继续白扔钱。

entry.def: If you get your money's worth, you get something which is worth the money that it costs or the effort you have put in.
entry.tran: 钱花得值;物有所值；没白忙活

example.ex: The fans get their money's worth.

means.word_mean: 1. the most common medium of exchange; functions as legal tender;

sentences.sentence: "we tried to collect the money he owed us"

means.word_mean: 2. wealth reckoned in terms of money;

sentences.sentence: "all his money is in real estate"

means.word_mean: 3. the official currency issued by a government or national bank;

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French moneie, from Latin moneta 'mint, money', originally a title of the goddess Juno, in whose temple in Rome money was minted

sentences.cn: 借 / 存 / 花 / 挣钱

sentences.en: The money is much better in my new job.

sentences.cn: 东西不满意，可以退款。
sentences.en: If the item is not satisfactory, you will get your money back.

sentences.cn: 小心别弄坏那东西，它可值钱了。
sentences.en: Be careful with that ─it cost a lot of money .

sentences.cn: 我仔细点了这笔钱。
sentences.en: I counted the money carefully.

sentences.cn: 成千上万的人花很多钱去观看这支乐队的演出。

sentences.en: The fans get their money's worth.

sentences.cn: 就是把全世界的财富都给我我也不会放弃你.
sentences.en: I wouldn't trade you for the all money in the world.

sentences.cn: 此外,情绪的转变也跟财富的转变一样重要.
sentences.en: What is more a change in mood is as important as a change in money.

sentences.cn: 按着通俗的说法,财富与货币,无论从哪一点看来, 都是同义语.
sentences.en: Wealth and money in short , are, in common language , considered as in every respect synonymous.

sentences.cn: 第三, 金钱充当一个商店的财富.
sentences.en: Thirdly, money as a store of wealth.

sentences.cn: 一个贤明的人曾经说过愚人是留不住财富的.
sentences.en: A wise man once said that a fool and his money are soon parted.

sentences.cn: 苍蝇虽然令人生厌, 但它也能为人带来财富.
sentences.en: Although fly is fulsome, but it also can bring money for the person.

sentences.cn: 我们的私人财富, 如每人所持有的金钱等即在第二房间之列.
sentences.en: Personal possessions are within this domain, as is our money.

sentences.cn: 对你来说最重要的财富在什么地方, 你该怎么获得它?
sentences.en: Where's the metaphorical money that matters most to you, and how can you get it?

sentences.cn: 血腥就是金钱, 暴力就是财富.
sentences.en: Blood is money; violence is fortune.

sentences.cn: 我的存款像磁铁一般为我吸引更多财富.
sentences.en: My savings act as a magnet to draw more money.

sentences.cn: 知识才能解决问题并创造财富, 不是凭财务知识挣来的钱很快就会消失.
sentences.en: Intelligence solves problems and produces money. Money without financial intelligence is money soon gone.

sentences.cn: 是什么了帐户里的财富缩水?
sentences.en: What accounts for the loss of money in account?

sentences.cn: 钱职责,作为交易媒介,价值标准和商店的财富.
sentences.en: Money functions as a medium of exchange a standard of value and a store of wealth.

sentences.cn: 虽然她很有钱,可她还是渴望财富.
sentences.en: She after wealth although she had much money.

sentences.cn: 一个人可以证明他有能力处理和保存财富以后,这些东西就会随之而来.
sentences.en: These come only after one can prove that he capable of handling and keeping money.

sentences.cn: 象征: 春天, 重建, 生育 、 嫉妒 、 懂事, 健康成长 ( 植被 ) 和财富 ( 钱 ).
sentences.en: Symbolises: spring, renewal, fertility, jealousy, inexperience, health, growth ( vegetation ) and wealth ( money ).

sentences.cn: 珍爱自己并且清楚你有资格而且值得拥有大量财富.
sentences.en: Love yourself and know that you are deserving and worthy of an abundance of money.

sentences.cn: 如果你尽可能节约的话,你会积蓄一笔财富.
sentences.en: Your money could bulk up to a fortune if you save everything you can.

sentences.cn: 资产救济项目资金的注入给金融体系增假了更多财富.
sentences.en: The injection of Troubled Asset Relief Programme funds added more money to the financial system.

sentences.cn: 这些非货币性财富包括关注度 ( 网站流量 ) 和声望.
sentences.en: Fortune of these blame money sex include attention to spend ( website discharge ) look harmonically.

sentences.cn: 所以金钱根本是媒介, 财富才是根本.
sentences.en: So money is the media, wealth is fundamental.

sentences.cn: 自由是不能以金钱来衡量的, 自由是无价的财富.
sentences.en: Liberty can not be valued by money. liberty an inestimable good.

sentences.cn: 财富并不一定带来快乐.
sentences.en: Money doesn't always bring happiness.

sentences.cn: 财富未必创造文明, 文明却能带来金钱.
sentences.en: Wealth may not produce civilization, but civilization produce money.

sentences.cn: 有些人对金钱,财富,并认为它必须具有内在的价值.
sentences.en: Some people look on money as wealth and believe that it must have intrinsic value.

sentences.cn: 战争的原动力就是为了获取无尽的财富.
sentences.en: The sinews of war are infinite money.

sentences.cn: 可见, 工程项目成本管理对企业财富的积聚至关重要.
sentences.en: Visible, management of project project cost is crucial to the accumulation of company money.

sentences.cn: 他正式同意放弃对这笔财富的要求.
sentences.en: He renounced his claim to the money.

sentences.cn: 每个人都寻找硬币以求在新的一年里好运及拥有财富.
sentences.en: Everyone tries to find the coin for luck and money in the New Year.

sentences.cn: 市场经济条件下, 个人能力与占有财富的不同将导致收入存在差距.
sentences.en: Below market economy condition, individual ability differs with what have money will cause income existence difference.

sentences.cn: 我的新工作薪水高多了。
sentences.en: The money is much better in my new job.

sentences.cn: 但是，未来真正的问题是，如果人们没有钱（因为他们找不到一份薪水足够高的工作）又怎么负担得起这些呢。这
sentences.en: But, the real question in the future is, how come people afford these things if they don't have money, because they can’t get a job that pays enough
sentences.from: 18年6月六级真题(第二套)| 听力

sentences.cn: 他对金融业员工的薪水将回落到正常水平表示称赞.
sentences.en: Fewer will do jobs they hate just for the money.

sentences.cn: 到一家公司工作,总得要有个头街和足够的薪水.所有关于将来的承诺往往难以兑现.
sentences.en: Always get a title and sufficient money going a company: promise about future potential always overstated.

sentences.cn: 大公司总裁们能拿那么高的薪水,是因为他们能够解决别人不能解决的问题.
sentences.en: CEOs of big companies paidamounts of money because they solve problems that nobody else can solve.

sentences.cn: 你的薪水很好,同时它很有意思.
sentences.en: You earn good money and it's interesting.

sentences.cn: 为了避开豪华税,一部份的薪水将会延迟给付.
sentences.en: Some of the money will be deferred for luxury tax purposes.

sentences.cn: 因为我想赚更多钱, 而贵公司薪水不错.
sentences.en: I want to make more money, and your company offers a good salary.

sentences.cn: 但是你的工作很好. 你的薪水很好,同时它很有意思.
sentences.en: But your job is good. You earn good money and it's interesting.

sentences.cn: 他肯定应该拿更高的薪水.
sentences.en: He's definitely worth more money.

sentences.cn: 他们将发现在他们的后半部分职业生涯中他们将为工作机会和薪水而战.
sentences.en: They'll find themselves competing for jobs and money the rest of their careers.

sentences.cn: 这家公司付的薪水颇丰.
sentences.en: They pay good money in this company.

sentences.cn: 助研金是指(研究生协助)工作后所得的薪水或免费课程.
sentences.en: Assistantships are jobs paid with money or free classes.

sentences.cn: 这个职位的薪水是多少?
sentences.en: How much money does the person earn in this position?

sentences.cn: 讨论薪水的最佳时机是在一家公司打算要聘用你的时候.
sentences.en: The best time to about money is when a company about to make you an offer.

sentences.cn: 我的薪水不高, 但那并不重要,因为我喜欢我的工作.
sentences.en: I don't earn much money, but it's not very important because I love my job.

sentences.cn: 在许多地方谈论钱或薪水都是不和时宜的.
sentences.en: It's not customary in many places to talk about money or salary.

sentences.cn: 加班不见得不好. 至少你多拿到半天的薪水. 也是一笔收入啊.
sentences.en: Matt: Overtime so bad. At least you get paid and half. That can be good money.

sentences.cn: 我的薪水都是电汇到我的户头的.
sentences.en: The money for my pay is electronically transferred.

sentences.cn: 问:你将怎样花费你的薪水? 你想在新加坡挣多少钱?
sentences.en: How will you spend your salaries? How much money do you want to make In Singapore?

sentences.cn: 不要花很多钱而把你的薪水过早用掉.
sentences.en: Do not anticipate your earnings by spending a lot of money.

sentences.cn: 除了他的薪水,他们一无所有.
sentences.en: They had no money beyond his salary.

sentences.cn: 他被要求支付的金额与他的薪水相比微不足道。
sentences.en: The money he'd been ordered to pay was minimal in relation to his salary.

sentences.cn: 我们的牧师老是为这事或那事筹募款项, 但是从来也没能募集到足够把教堂大钟修复起来的钱.
sentences.en: Our vicar is always raising money for one cause or another, but he has never managed to get enough money to have the church clock repaired.

sentences.cn: 例一:我们已收到你方支票, 谢谢, 该笔款项已汇入你帐户贷方.
sentences.en: The sum of money has been remitted into your account after your cheque arrived, thanks. Lender.

sentences.cn: 你将收到与你的款项价值完全同等的物品.
sentences.en: You will receive the full equivalent of your money.

sentences.cn: 这笔钱是对你所做工作所付的款项.
sentences.en: This money is in payment for the work you have done.

sentences.cn: 这笔款项可从应征税的公司收入中扣除.
sentences.en: The money is deductible from taxable income.

sentences.cn: 国会为联邦项目也拨出了款项.
sentences.en: Congress also appropriates money for federal programs.

sentences.cn: 政府已拨出一大笔款项用于道路建设.
sentences.en: The government has appropriated a large sum of money for road building.

sentences.cn: 为挽救古老的教堂而筹集的款项现已达3.5万美金.
sentences.en: The collection of money to save the ancient church now stands at $ 35, 000.

sentences.cn: 这家医院收到捐赠来的大笔款项.
sentences.en: The hospital receives a good deal of money in donations.

sentences.cn: 这家银行拒绝给那家公司款项.
sentences.en: The bank refused to lend the company any more money.

sentences.cn: 请速将款项用汇票汇来.
sentences.en: Please remit promptly by money order.

sentences.cn: 作为办理证券业务借贷款项之资金来源.
sentences.en: As a source of funds for conducting securities business money lending.

sentences.cn: 一处分该证券商相对卖出之所得款项.
sentences.en: Dispose of the money obtained from the corresponding sale by the firm.

sentences.cn: 其中一个原因就是公众款项的运用不当.
sentences.en: Onereason is the misdirection of public money.

sentences.cn: 新图书馆的款项已经拨出.
sentences.en: Money has been earmarked for the new library.

sentences.cn: 然而, 款项的丧失和财政赤字将让他们注意.
sentences.en: However, loss of money and financial deficits will get them to pay attention.

sentences.cn: 款项会退回到消费者账户, 而商家则当作体验了一把免费的网络推广.
sentences.en: Money will return to consumers and businesses, while as account experience a free network promotion.

sentences.cn: 监督每日收入和支出的款项,对所有支出进行确认.
sentences.en: Monitor incoming and outgoing money daily and approve all disbursements.

sentences.cn: 我的资助款项是如何被使用的?
sentences.en: How is my sponsorship money spent?

sentences.cn: 他们决定采取募捐的办法来筹集这笔款项.
sentences.en: They decided to raise the money by subscription.

sentences.cn: 利息是向借给他钱的银行或建筑团体支付的款项.
sentences.en: Interest is a payment to the bank or the building society for lending him the money.

sentences.cn: 目前, 资金出自美国大使馆25万美元的紧急款项.
sentences.en: For now, the money is coming out of the embassy's $ 250, 000 emergency fund.

sentences.cn: 他们把两名未交纳所欠款项的会员开除出俱乐部.
sentences.en: They pitched two members out for failing to pay the money they owed.

sentences.cn: 这些士兵按职位高低来分摊款项,并清空自己的背包用来装钱.
sentences.en: Soldiers divided the money by rank and emptied their packs to make room for the cash.

sentences.cn: 据悉, 这笔款项部分已被用以偿还其个人债务.
sentences.en: It is reported, this money share already was repaid by order to its individual liabilities.

sentences.cn: 我们的重建计划搁了浅, 因为地方政府已经拒绝提供必要的款项.
sentences.en: Our plans for rebuilding have aground, as the council have refused to allow the necessary money.

sentences.cn: 他不得不求助于诉讼威胁获得所欠款项的付还.
sentences.en: He has to resort to threating of court action to get repayment of the money owing.

sentences.cn: 如果拆迁, 如何分配款项?
sentences.en: If the demolition, and how to allocate the money?

sentences.cn: 我们不能按期偿还款项.
sentences.en: We cannot repay the money according to schedule.

sentences.cn: 此款项将用于建设新学校 ( 的开销 ).
sentences.en: The money will go towards ( the cost of ) building a new school.
